T4transport 0.1.1

Function reference

[1] Wasserstein Distance

ipot() ipotD()
Computing Wasserstein Distance by Inexact Proximal Point Method
sinkhorn() sinkhornD()
Computing Wasserstein Distance by Entropic Regularization
wasserstein() wassersteinD()
Computing Wasserstein Distance between Empirical Measures

[2] Wasserstein Barycenter

Fixed Support

bary14C() bary14Cdist()
Barycenter by Cuturi & Doucet (2014)
bary15B() bary15Bdist()
Barycenter by Benamou et al. (2015)

[3] Special Cases

Empirical CDFs

Histograms

histbary14C()
Barycenter of Histograms by Cuturi & Doucet (2014)
histbary15B()
Barycenter of Histograms by Benamou et al. (2015)
histmed22Y()
Wasserstein Median of Histograms by You et al. (2022)

Images

imagebary14C()
Barycenter of Images according to Cuturi & Doucet (2014)
imagebary15B()
Barycenter of Images according to Benamou et al. (2015)
imagemed22Y()
Wasserstein Median of Images by You et al. (2022)

[4] Data

digit3
MNIST Images of Digit 3
digits
MNIST Images of All Digits
